title: Imagine an alien civilization wants to revert humanity back into the stone age as they fear our advance in technology, how would they do it? - Quora

response.answer_text: If they have interstellar travel, they are so far advanced that they won’t fear us. Do we fear birds probing for ants with a stick? We live in a gravity well, and we have our own diseases that we could infect them with. Any resources we have are likely more easily found by mining asteroids. They will also most likely live in space habitats, again outside a gravity well, so they are unlikely to care about our real estate. The more likely reasons for invading Earth are some form of “the white man’s burden” and some form of religious evangelism, those being the justifications humans have offered for conquering indigenous peoples. Should they want to kill us off for the real estate or for evangelism, the easiest way is a fatal virus with telomere lengths set to give them a limited replication time. If they wanted to destroy our civilization and leave us starving, EMP bombs would do it.
